name: Top 5 Suppliers For Buying
query:
SELECT 
    po.`supplier`, 
    SUM(poi.`qty`) AS total_quantity_purchased
FROM 
    `tabPurchase Order Item` poi
JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Order` po ON poi.`parent` = po.`name`
GROUP BY 
    po.`supplier`
ORDER BY 
    total_quantity_purchased DESC
LIMIT 5;
